mapper.insert: insert into RUN_MEMBER (id, name, pwd, email1, email2, birth, gender, admin) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{admin})
mapper.select: select * from RUN_MEMBER where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RUN_MEMBER WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE RUN_MEMBER SET name=#{name} , pwd=#{pwd} , email1=#{email1} , email2=#{email2} , birth=#{birth} ,gender=#{gender} where id = #{id}
